summary: Technology, operations, marketing, and networking.  These traits embody what I do.  I love my work, believe in building amazing brands, and surround myself with top notch players in many verticals to create a business model that excels.“He's a cool cat, an avid explorer, and social experimentalist (is that a thing, cause if it's not, I'm making it up). I don't think he's met a societal stigma or etiquette boundary that he hasn't thoroughly enjoyed demolishing. He also introduced me to trampoline dodgeball."         An introduction quote given about by                                                                     Heather Lynne Herr,                                                                     Right This MinuteOn a serious note, I have background in more than 40 verticals, I think strategically, while reacting in real time.  I can not only create a vision, but rally and build passion behind it, project manage it till it manifests, then reinvent the next round of it.  I love my work and love to build brands.  I have an amazing network of colleagues and cohorts who inspire and support my ideas, inspirations and make work fun.
